From my perspective, it's netorare because there was the act(action) of a guy trying to steal the MC's love interest/girlfriend/etc, regardless of the bastard's interests' status (but obviously he wants to fuck her so yea). I read a web article somewhere that it explained netorare basically is "being taken/sleeping with someone else's" in Japanese, and it is a passive form of netoru. I have zero knowledge of Japanese but that's how I remember what it is from that article.
